detectors.description:
Reentrancy in PITokenLocker.release() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#309-317):
	External calls:
	- _token.transfer(_beneficiary,releaseAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#313)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _releasedEpoch = epoch (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#314)

detectors.description:
PITokenLocker.canReleaseAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#294-307) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- epoch <= _releasedEpoch (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#295)
	- epoch > _totalEpoch (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PITokenLocker.sol#300)
